attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Modify rules on property management to increase the maximum amount of expenditure per flat which leads to the requirement for statutory consultation.  At present, this is set at £250 per flat which is not inflation linked.  This figure is too low and results in very high costs for flat owners in blocks.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
